name: Granny but terrible and made in coppercube and you can't escape
name_original: Granny but terrible and made in coppercube and you can't escape
description:
Granny but terrible and made in coppercube and you can't escape is a game developed by Legocoder123. It came out on 18-10-2022.
Granny but terrible and made in coppercube and you can't escape is available on PC. The game is sold via itch.io.
